intro: Impatiens huangyanensis, commonly known as the Huangyan Impatiens, is a species of flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Gesneriaceae and is characterized by its vibrant, showy flowers that typically bloom in shades of red, pink, and white. The plant features heart-shaped leaves and a compact growth habit, making it suitable for both garden cultivation and container planting. It thrives in moist, well-drained soil and partial to full shade, often found in forest understories. Due to its limited distribution and unique floral characteristics, it is of interest to botanists and horticultural enthusiasts.
